content.text:
# Draft:IRESC Suite of Software Products

----
IRESC Suite is a collection of software products offered by IRESC Global, a process-safety and risk-consulting firm serving oil & gas, petrochemical and heavy-industry clients. Company materials and events show that the firm markets a suite of products including Haz360 and FIGCO. IRESC staff and the company participate in professional process-safety forums and post product information and brochures online.
References
